name: RadioAnanda
0:
”Alexa, Open Radio Ananda”
”Alexa, Start Radio Ananda”
”Alexa, Launch Radio Ananda”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: radio ananda
des:
Radio Ananda (Sanskrit for "joy") offers a blend of uplifting music to expand our listeners’ consciousness. Rather than stirring the emotions, it lifts the listener into states of calm feeling, igniting intuition and soul qualities such as bliss, love, peace, power, and wisdom.

Our music is performed and produced by members of Ananda Worldwide, a movement of souls seeking joy and inner freedom through the universal teachings of Paramhansa Yogananda, author of the spiritual classic, Autobiography of a Yogi.

Ananda’s founder, Swami Kriyananda, a direct disciple of Yogananda, wrote over 400 pieces of inspirational music which form the core of our programming.

Instructions to work with the skill: 

Invoke the skill by saying. Alexa, Open Radio Ananda.

For listening to Music, say ‘Music’. 

To listen to Instrumental, say ‘Instrumental’. 

Enjoyed the music? Visit www.ananda.org for more inspiration.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
